content.rendered:
Air Kiribati Limited is the national airline of Kiribati operating passenger services within the Gilbert Islands of Kiribati, and to Fiji. It also operates charters, medical evacuation and search and rescue services. It was founded on 1995. Its main base is Bonriki International Airport, Tarawa Atoll. Until 2008, it was the only airline to operate Kiribati domestic routes. In January, 2009, a new airline was established, Coral Sun Airways, that also flies to all of the Gilbert Islands.

Air Kiribati Address:
 Air Kiribati Airport Office:

Bonriki International Airport, Tarawa, Kiribati

Air Kiribati Reservation Office:

Bairiki, Kiribati

Phone:
+68628532

Bonriki Switchboard: + 686 74028533

Reservations Bairki: +686 75021188 / 75021189

Traffic and Ground Operations: +686 75229717

Email: reservation@airkiribati.com.ki., info@airkiribati.com.ki

Air Kiribati Official website:http://www.airkiribati.com.ki/

Air Kiribati Online Check-in: www.air kiribati.com/in/gb/online check-in

Note:Check In 2 hours before departure, as check-in closes 1 hour prior to take-off.

Check Air Kiribati schedule here: www.air kiribati.com/in/gb/flight schedule

Check Air Kiribati flight status here: www.air kiribati.com/in/gb/flight status

Air Kiribati Baggage Allowance

Air Kiribati Baggage

View Air Kiribati Checked baggage charges in the above link.

Near-by Airports: Cassidy International Airport, Bonriki International Airport

Attractions in Tarawa, Kiribati: Bonriki (Atoll in Kiribati), Bikeman Island (Islet in Kiribati)

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Air Kiribati

Total fleet: 4

ATR 42/72

  • ATR 72

Queries handled by Air Kiribati Airlines Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Air Kiribati Tarawa, Kiribati Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Air Kiribati Tarawa, Kiribati: (click on the stars below)
